page.shortlink: api desktop api object class kind of function

item.name:
Control Panel (for <OBJECT> use the keyword "CONTROLPANEL")]></name> </item>
<item> <name><![CDATA[Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)
Form Controls (for <OBJECT> use the <CONTROL> pointer or the address of the control)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.KINDOF() method returns the kind of object.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Travel Time") ? ptr.KindOf() = "Window"
